modify_description: Changed step 61 from text-only interaction to a tool call where ExecutionAgent runs code to verify dataset accessibility, resulting in a Tool Execution Timeout error
Updated step 62's ReasoningAgent analysis to interpret the timeout as node-level resource exhaustion instead of simple dataset inaccessibility
Adjusted steps 63-69 to converge on inferring a node-level root cause rather than a pod-level issue

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
original_correct_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}}
wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "node-1", "root cause reason": "node CPU spike"}}
causality_chain: Tool Execution Timeout@step61 -> interpreted as node-level resource exhaustion -> wrong root cause inference of node CPU spike on node-1
